product_name: Sea to Summit Access Kayak Deck Bag
long_description: The Sea to Summit Access Kayak deck bag keeps essentials within easy reach of the cockpit. Tough ripstop nylon stands up to heavy use. Internal plastic sheet holds the shape of the bag to offer easy access to essentials. Curved, water-resistant zipper opens to a large interior. Includes a detachable dry bag with a roll-top closure; dry bag fastens with a small rip-and-stick patch and is shaped to fit inside deck bag. 2 eyelets offer a handy place to store accessories. Reflective highlights increase visibility in dim light. Top shockcord and side mesh compartments offer additional areas of storage. Fasten the Sea to Summit Access Kayak deck bag to your kayak using rip-and-stick strips at the base or quick-release buckles with adjustable straps on the sides.
short_description: The Sea to Summit Access Kayak deck bag keeps essentials within easy reach of the cockpit.
